_header: Nis no clune [?] alive that maketh woman
_description: Aphorism about lovers being most likely source of woman’s tears — one couplet

CULFf117.Transcription:
Nes no clune on liue þat maketh wammanswo sore to wipen as hire
                    lefmon
CULFf117.Note:
Added to lower margin below prose notes on
                    ‘mulier’.
